text: West Silvertown is a station on the Docklands Light Railway which opened in December 2005. It is on the Woolwich Arsenal branch. Trains run Westbound to Bank in the City of London and Eastbound to Woolwich Arsenal, passing through London City Airport station. The station is in the London Borough of Newham and is in Travelcard Zone 3. == Gallery == Image:West Silvertown stn look east.JPG|Platforms looking east Image:West Silvertown stn westbound.JPG|Platforms looking west Image:West Silvertown stn signage.JPG|Platform signage Image:West Silvertown stn southern entrance.JPG|Entrance on southern side ==References== == Other websites == * Docklands Light Railway website - West Silvertown station page Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham Category:London Travelcard zone 3
title: West Silvertown DLR station
